org.ccnx.ccn.utils.ccnputfile

org.ccnx.ccn.utils.ccnputfile Class Reference

Command-line utility to write a file to ccnd; requires a corresponding ccngetfile to pull the data or it will not move (flow balance). More...

Detailed Description

Command-line utility to write a file to ccnd; requires a corresponding ccngetfile to pull the data or it will not move (flow balance).
